ygData.subject: Re: MM Castle Tour was: Gypsy Lute
ygData.msgSnippet: I wish my guild was as large and high level as yours; we are a great group but smaller.  We normally have just under 20 total on a busy night; have a wizard
ygData.messageBody:
I wish my guild was as large and high level as yours; we are a great group
but smaller. We normally have just under 20 total on a busy night; have a
wizard who just hit 50 last week; a couple in the 40's; myself and about 5
others in mid-to upper 30's...

I look forward to the future when the majority advance high enough to do
stuff like this. Thanks for the info Sylly!

Slyde

> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>

<snip>

> The whole event ran just over 2 hours and was great fun to come into to a
> very scary zone and simply over power it. A while back someone posted
here
> about trying this with 'pick-up groups' or a server event. Maybe it could
> be done. But doing it as a guild gives you many advantages. First off,
you
> trust everyone and know you have the right classes to handle things - hehe
> level 50 clerics make the world of difference in your confidence. And for
> us, it was a great "fun" event for everyone to be involved with.
>
> And yes, the scenery there is some of the very best in the game. It is by
> far one of my most favorite zones.
>
> Sylly SongSynger
> Bardette of 46 songs
> <The Pantheon>
> somewhere on Innoruuk...
>
